comment_118:
This song is such bullshit. I like the production and Shady's singing is better than he thinks, but come on. Everyone's gushing about how sensitive and mature he is now? He starts singing about his beautiful little girl, but of course he can't make it halfway through ONE FUCKING SONG without it degenerating into angry ranting against his ex-wife and entire family. "I'm so glad her mom didn't" and the censored part is "abort her" for anyone who couldn't figure that out. I think anyone who is a child of divorce will understand the concept of using a kid as leverage - "look at how much I love her. You bitch". If he really cared about his daughter so much he wouldn't turn a love song for her into that bullshit (which makes up the majority of his other songs). Listen to "Drips" - that's our new grown-up Eminem. That's like saying Family Guy is more mature and refined than South Park.

By the way - to all the 14 year old idiots going "Fuck Kim yo", you've never met her in your life and she has not had the platform to say one word about her marriage to Eminem.  Just because he airs all his dirty laundry in his songs doesn't make it all true. He says so himself. I can't wait until he makes a track about how he dropped his ice cream when he was 3 years old and nobody held his hand. Fucking shut up.

This song is hella tite b/c its really raw, but also because you dont just have to be a dad getting his daughter back to be able to relate to it.

'Some days i sit, staring out the window 
Watchin' this world pass me by 
Sometimes i think there's nothing to live for 
I almost break down and cry 

Sometimes i think i'm crazy 
I'm crazy, oh so crazy 
Why am i here, am i just wasting my time? '-Who doesant get like this sometimes?

'I act like shit, dont phase me, 
Inside it drives me crazy 
My insecurities could eat me alive'-I'm deffinitly the kind of person who plays it cool ALL THE DAMN time. Anyone know how exhausting it is to just fight everyday to keep a smile on your face and pretend life is just fine? I'm sure a crap load of people do.


'But then i see my baby 
Suddenly i'm not crazy 
It all makes sense when i look into her eyes'-When all this is going on, this line is very relative to when I'm just going crazy. Then I get away from everyone, and i'm with my baby. A 4 yr old arabian that I broke on my own. I saved her from an abusive home, and trained her. She makes me sane.

'Somtimes it feels like the world's on my shoulders 
Everyone's leaning on me 
Cos sometimes it feels like the world's almost over 
But then she comes back to me ' This is me just trying to live up to impossible expectations set by relatives, etc...

i like how he has his sensitive side with just him singing then has to get all loud and angry before the chorus starts, it's awesome. and of chorus him topping it off with a rapped verse :) he is truly an amazing artist to combine so much feeling into one song and have it actually mean something.
comment_232: Its like wen all hells brakes out.. an everyting goin downhill wit no sign of return.. u got yur "baby".. somting dat reminds u an makes u really like everyting gonna b ok... i love dis song.. weneva i'm down i listen 2 it.. an i'm back again.. jus got 2 get somting 2 b my baby...lol^.^

comment_234:
I believe he intended to use a clip from While My Guitar Gently Weeps in this song similar to how he does in "Sing for the Moment" with Aerosmith's song, but couldn't get the permissions so he had to take it out.

I really enjoy this song.
comment_235:
Eminem has a sensitive side? This song seriously makes me want to cry! I almost did listening to it for the first time. He makes it seem as though he is really sensitive the whole time, Then he gets sorta that side of him that we all like. The crazy side >=|!!  People say he's all bad, But he seriously loves his daughter more then anything in the world! I like eminems sensitive side...however it's not the side I would want to listen to all the time. Plus he can't sing! I think his singing voice is horrible!
